import React from 'react' import { Box, styled } from '@mui/system' import { Breadcrumb, SimpleCard } from 'app/components' import { Icon, Button, IconButton, Fab } from '@mui/material' const AppButtonRoot = styled('div')(({ theme }) => ({ margin: '30px', [theme.breakpoints.down('sm')]: { margin: '16px', }, '& .breadcrumb': { marginBottom: '30px', [theme.breakpoints.down('sm')]: { marginBottom: '16px', }, }, '& .button': { margin: theme.spacing(1), }, '& .input': { display: 'none', }, })) const StyledButton = styled(Button)(({ theme }) => ({ margin: theme.spacing(1), })) export default function AppButton() { return (
Default Primary Secondary Disabled Link Default Primary Secondary Disabled Link Default Primary Secondary Disabled Link Inherit delete delete alarm add_shopping_cart add add add add edit_icon navigation Extended delete ) }
